title: Kraken Arcaflow scenarios
description: Serial execution of Arcaflow Python plugins. See https://github.com/arcaflow for details.

namespace_pattern.title: Namespace pattern
namespace_pattern.description: Regular expression for target pod namespaces.

name_pattern.title: Name pattern
name_pattern.description: Regular expression for target pods. Required if label_selector is not set.

kill.title: Number of pods to kill
kill.description: How many pods should we attempt to kill?

label_selector.title: Label selector
label_selector.description:
Kubernetes label selector for the target pods. Required if name_pattern is not set.
See https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/working-with-objects/labels/ for details.

kubeconfig_path.title: Kubeconfig path
kubeconfig_path.description:
Path to your Kubeconfig file. Defaults to ~/.kube/config.
See https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/organize-cluster-access-kubeconfig/ for details.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout to wait for the target pod(s) to be removed in seconds.

backoff.title: Backoff
backoff.description: How many seconds to wait between checks for the target pod status.
